dialogue.raw_text: You know what sucks? Realizing that everything you believe in is complete bullshit.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Destiny, soulmates, true love. All that stuff. It's nothing more than silly childhood fairy tale nonsense, isn't it? God!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I should have listened to you, Summer. You were right all along.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: One day I'm reading a book at the corner deli and this guy sits down and starts asking about it. Now he's my husband!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What would have happened if I went to the movies instead? If I went somewhere else for lunch? If I showed up to eat ten minutes later? Tom, it was meant to be, just like you said. And as it was happening, I knew it. I could feel it, sure as the sun. And I kept thinking to myself "Holy shit. Tom was right." You were right about all of it. (BEAT) It just wasn't me you were right about.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Anyway, I should probably be getting back. It was good to see you. I'm glad you're well.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: She stops and turns back. He takes in her face, most likely for the last time ever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And she walks away. The CAMERA TRACKS AWAY with her, leaving Tom alone in the park, getting smaller and farther away every second.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I really do hope you're happy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.ToD: A FEW SECONDS OF BLACK, BEFORE
result.heading: A FEW SECONDS OF BLACK, BEFORE

direction.raw_text: Tom, in a suit, with a hefty batch of architecture sketches at his side, waits in the foyer of Allen, Prince, and Gethers Architecture. From the room we can tell this firm is big time. Tom waits. We notice, before he does, a VERY CUTE GIRL sitting in a another chair, also waiting. She smiles. He smiles back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They both laugh. There's a silence for a few beats. And it's during this time that something weird comes over Tom and we can visibly see it in his face. He likes the look of this girl. This girl is cute. He'd like to talk more with her. And, honestly, he's a little surprised by it.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Are you interviewing? For the position?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Gee, this is a little awkward.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, I hope you don't get it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I hope you don't get it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Grew up not too far from here. Atherton, near Stanford.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: uh, don't know. I don't think so.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do you go to St. Patrick's? Not to pray or anything but to stand outside?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I do! I love that church. It's like my favorite structure in the city.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If only it wasn't near that horrible mirrored thing...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah. (BEAT) I think I've seen you there.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You have? Really? Hmm. I didn't see you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It happens. You probably weren't looking.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: comes out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He starts to go. But halfway through the doorway, he pauses and looks back at the girl.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: If Tom had learned anything... it was that you can't ascribe great cosmic significance to a simple earthly event. Coincidence. That's all anything ever is. Nothing more than coincidence.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . 1 second clip of the colored sequence. Real fast. Hardly noticeable. But it's there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom turns back around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He turns back around and shakes that off, tries to refocus on the task at hand. A job interview. And then he hears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom turns back around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She laughs. She's cute when she laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She puts out her hand to meet his. They shake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And on his face...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: It took a long time but Tom had finally learned. There are no miracles. There's no such thing as fate. Nothing is meant to be. He knew. He was sure of it now. (BEAT) Tom was...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: When this is over... uh... would you like to maybe...grab a cup of coffee or something?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh. I'm sorta supposed to meet someone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Great! So... I'll wait for you here, or you wait for me or...something.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ok! (extends hand to shake) My name's Tom.
dialogue.name: dialogue
